name: The Deck of Warmth
description:
You are stranded in cold mountains with nothing but your trusty deck to help you survive until the help comes. Can you hold off for 30 turns by keeping your heat up and fighting against random events?

The Deck of Warmth was made for Mini Jam 124.

Controls and tips:
- Right click on the deck or a log object to draw a card
- Drop a card over an object (including heart icon) to apply it if possible
- Once you have no action points, press spacebar or click on a turn icon to start a new turn
- Experiment with cards, you might find some alternative uses for them
